select count(1) as simPoolCount, sum(tt.active) as onlinePoolCount, sum(tt.type) as cardSlotCount, sum(tt.count) as simCardCount from( select p.id, case when p.isactive=1 then 1 else 0 end active, ifnull(type,0) type, count(1) count from m_simpool p left join m_simcard c on p.id=c.cpid left join m_department d on p.departmentId=d.id and d.status=0 where 1=1
group by p.id,p.isactive,p.type ) tt
